website_summaries.verdict: The best choice for people wanting a true looker. Elegant leather finish stands out among other barstool sets.
pros: Swiveling mechanism is easy to use, making it convenient to get on and off the bar stool when space is more constrained
cons: Pure white leather is susceptible to stain

customer_reviews.title: Also they were SUPER easy to put them together
customer_reviews.text: They look so expensive and fancy! Also they were SUPER easy to put them together. We love them. And they don't tip like some reviews have said u less you are sitting on the edge... I don't know why you would though. My husband is build big and weighs around 230 and sits fine in them! They are comfy and easy to clean if you spill (no stains!!). The seats are adjustable! I'm 5'4" and my husband is 6'1" we both fit in them nicely!
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these stools to put at the new kitchen breakfast bar. They are really nice, look like leather although they are not. Were easy to put together, and came very well packed. It took more time to strip the packing off than to assemble. When we have visitors, they head to the bar stools instead of chairs. I like that the base is large enough to make them really stable. Now the price is $20 less than I paid. I recommend you snap them up at the current price. It would be hard to buy them at a second hand store for this price.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schoellhorn

customer_reviews.title: Shut Up and Sit!
customer_reviews.text: I recommend you use this on a hard surface so the chair will stay straight up. If on carpet (and padding) the weight of your body will make the chair lean forward and make it a bit uncomfortable. The hydraulic handle really raises and lowers the chair effectively. The chair is very light weight. For the price it looks great.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: but the seat is super plush and overall very nice
customer_reviews.text: Only had a few days, but the seat is super plush and overall very nice. A cinch to put together. Very nice looking in appearance. My only concern is if the foam at the leading edge will last over time as that's where the most pressure is from legs hanging over. No reason to believe it won't. The foot bar is strong enough to adjust in seat but I'd be careful got that weld joint it's a lot of torque to put weight on that skinny bar. I'm 180 lbs. Overall I like this very much and the back support is strong and reasonably ergonomic enough for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Nextari

customer_reviews.title: Could be a liability issue in a business.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but will tip if raised higher and/or heavyweight person sits on them. Nothing you can do about it as the base is too small with no weight on them. I'm using them for my office but also don't raise them or will warn people if I think they need to be warned, i.e, bring in their kids or are heavy set. For the price, it is what it is. Packed very nicely and very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K.

customer_reviews.title: Good for small space
customer_reviews.text: My son inlay assembled and he is great at that so I really don't know if it is easy for someone who does not do that.. I am glad I bought an extra seat. I had a guest who had black on and her dress faded on one of the seats so I exchange it with the extra one I had placed in my bathroom. To adjust the seats you have to raise before you sit in it and to lower you must sit in it. If your legs are short you cannot lower the seat without getting in the seat first which complicates the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Edwinna Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little stool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little stool. I like the size. Not too big, not too small, just right for my music room. Nice padding on the seat. Feels strong. Has a great up and down feature, with lots of variation in height, and it has a nice strong foot rest. Easy to assemble. I love this stool.!!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Great stool while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stool to sit at a standing level desk and has been very comfortable and sturdy for a little over a year of usage. However the base of the stool has begun coming apart and now the entire stool wiggles excessively, it is getting progressively worse and I'm sure it will come completely apart before too much longer. If you're on a tight budget and only need to use this stool very occasionally this might be good, but if you plan to get serious use out of this then spend a little extra money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: it's a good deal. Probably not suited for people over 175 ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's a good deal. Probably not suited for people over 175 lbs., doesn't seem that sturdy to me. Not safe for kids because of the tipping factor.
customer_reviews.author: Pezqueen

customer_reviews.title: Purchase only if you enjoy metal shavings on your floor
customer_reviews.text: Pros- chair is comfy and looks nice Cons- it is tippy if you use it at full height. **Biggest issue is when sitting on the chair and rotating it, it grinds together (a horrible noise). See photos of how bad it it....literally grinding the metal off! Now I have metal shavings in my rug. Not happy. :/ Note: the only people who use this chair are my teenage girls who do not weight more than 110 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and pretty sturdy. I am not a big person but it is a bit narrow for me. I use this for coloring at my craft table and wish the seat was just a little wider, otherwise it's just fine for the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: MaddieTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this if you have kids in home
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with the color and size. But after using it for couple of the days i am facing a problem. The base is not really able to hold the seat sturdy. I have tipped off the chair a couple of times and 1 time i got hurt. It is also leaving scratches due to that on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: kirti

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: barstools are exactly what they were advertised to be. Easy to assemble. I just wish there were a little heavier but they look to be sturdy. I am using them in my patio with free standing black and chrome bar. I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.author: James R. Sammann

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE STAIN
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to really love this chair! it's very easy to assemble, it looks beautiful, its abit small ! My issue is this WHITE chair has ORANGE stains! I contacted seller.. I'll update once seller contacts me. UPDATE: I WAS CONTACTED BY SELLER REQUESTING PICTURES OF THE STAINS...THAT WAS SENT TO THEM AND THIS MORNING I RECEIVED AN EMAIL WITH THE SELLER ASKING IF A $12 REFUND WAS ACCEPTABLE.. WHICH IS NOT,I PAID $76 (WITH TAX) FOR THIS CHAIR!
customer_reviews.author: michelle mut

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed it for!
customer_reviews.text: Goes perfectly under my counter top. Yes, it's a little tipsy if it's fully extended and you are reaching/moving around a lot, but I mean, that's physics guys. It is well worth the money and has held up well with daily (sometimes ALL DAY because I use it at my work station) use for a month with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Clifford

customer_reviews.title: Measure height ! Amazing buy. 😍
customer_reviews.text: My wife LOVED it and she is super picky. I bought it for her vanity . Unfortunately it's too tall so she can't use it for that. Be careful with the measurements . I wasn't able to measure being so far away but from the reviews it's apparenlty 3 feet high at it's lowest... they're better off as bar stools.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Cheap defective chair.
customer_reviews.text: Defective design. The chair is literally falling over when you sit in it. A clear safety concern. My current height adjustable chairs are 10 years old and blow this cheap product out of the water. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: beastmaster

customer_reviews.title: Screws keep coming out underneath
customer_reviews.text: The screws underneath that attach the chair to the frame keep coming out. I've tried tightening them many times but they keep coming out. I might have to glue them in. They aren't bad chairs and the adjusting (up/down) feature is great, but the screw issue is a big pain point.
customer_reviews.author: CAHS

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these except one of my stools is already making a grinding noise when it swivels. Would be nice if the back was a bit higher but they are comfortable and easy to adjust. I was worried they would scratch up the floor but they don't. Easy to clean too!
customer_reviews.author: nanny22

customer_reviews.title: but it feels like real). Seats are very soft
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks very high class with the pure white leather (not real leather of course, but it feels like real). Seats are very soft. Cons: Even though the height is adjustable, the minimum height is still quite tall though (I am 5'4 and I am not able to touch the ground when seated), if adjusted to the tallest it is really really tall. Overall I am still very satisfied with this purchase so I am giving 5 star. I have recommended to many friends.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned Investor

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together and very nice
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and very nice! ❤️ I got it for my clients so I can do makeup and hair. It’s tall enough and more stable than a directors chair. 100% as described. Very HAPPY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mlle_Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Nice. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking barstool. Very easy to assemble. Unfortatley, it’s not very sturdy. Gets a bit wobbly on carpet and hard floors which can be dangerous for younger kids becuase it we definitely fall over. Comfort is nice. If you are a bigger person this chair may not be sturdy and wide enough for you.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy the red color unless orange is acceptable.
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about the chairs except the color. My wife picked these out based on the RED color in the picture. However, when we unpacked them, the color was clearly orange or at best....orange-red. We understand that the color red can have a broad range and intensity. But this color isn't even close to any red in our house. Not crayon , color pencil, marker, kitchen utensils, blankets, towels, rugs, etc...Definitely orange.
customer_reviews.author: Kharis J.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: We originally ordered two but liked them so much we ordered another set. Unfortunately one chair came broken on the second order. We contacted the seller (Costway) and they responded right away and took care of the issue immediately. I will have to say that you do have to be careful sitting on them. I’m 5’3” 153lbs and even I am capable of tipping over if not careful. I love the chairs. Just be careful when you have visitors.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small
customer_reviews.text: I’m so disappointed got chair for clients to do makeup chair is small tilts over but, super cute I would return it but I won’t get a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Love this barstool - but I use it differently
customer_reviews.text: I love this stool for it's light weight and that it looks so solid. I tote it around to use with a product demo, and it's absolutely perfect. It has a great range of height adjustment. I love having a back my clients can lean against - good for posture and I'm quite happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Medin

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, somewhat comfortable. A little unstable on carpet, but not bad on hardwood. My Roomba likes to drive up the base like it’s a ramp, but hasn’t ever flipped or anything.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool bars
customer_reviews.text: I am giving it 5stars because of the good customer service they got!. I like the tool bar and it was easy to put together. But the other one got some issues on it and I contacted the seller and they’re really nice. I am impressed how they handled the problem, very good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Bhe

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Very classic look, fits under our bar counter. The stand seems a little un-sturdy, but we just bought for our kiddos. So adults buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Love the material and quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and quality, but the backing is very straight at 90 degrees. It would be fine if it was a larger seat but because the seat is already small, it feels like its pushing me a bit forward
customer_reviews.author: BonnieSyndra

customer_reviews.title: Great stool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter's vanity in her room she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: G2THEZ

customer_reviews.title: Throw them in the trash now
customer_reviews.text: These barstools are garbage. Though they look nice, if you try to actually put any weight on them to sit down they will fall over. My 10 year old flew off and the barstool fell to the ground by just trying to get off the chair. They are impossible to disassemble so I can’t return them for a refund. The seller will not help me with the issue. Please save yourself the time, and for safety alone don’t buy these barstools.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Turner

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great
customer_reviews.text: This Chair looks great, and was super easy to put together, BUT it's not sturdy or heavy. I have it on carpet and it's pretty wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Price is good, material is sturdy and can be cleaned easily.. putting together was super fast ... I almost live it but the back of it looks too straight ... I hope it grows on me because I ordered two more
customer_reviews.author: claudia

customer_reviews.title: Look
customer_reviews.text: Great looking.Style, color, and material were a perfect match for our kitchen.If you tighten bolts during assembly, it will be sturdy enough.Although the delivery is longer than prime 2 days, the chair arrived on time as promised. Good side is that they are comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.author: bjorn hansen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bar Stools
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, and they add such a nice pop of color to the room! Recently remodeled and added a breakfast bar to the kitchen. These bar stools are perfect for the space and the theme.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Nice 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great looking chair. It was easy to put together but it sits to high for a smaller vanity.. I liked this chair alllot but it’s not sturdy to put on carpet..
customer_reviews.author: Juan &. Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our bathroom vanity! It is the perfect height for our counters and we love it so much! Isn’t super comfy to sit for long periods of time, but very very fashionable looking! And we love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Material is really good and it makes my kitchen look amazing
customer_reviews.author: evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Misrepresentation
customer_reviews.text: It is not explained that the stools are extremely light weight and not sturdy. The seats are not large enough for an adult to sit comfortably in and they are too flimsy for a child to climb in. The backs of the stool are too short. Upon returning could not take the entire stool a loose and had to pay for additional shipping for larger box etc Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla White

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Update after 2 years of using every day: still in very good shape, no broken parts! Very happy and satisfied! Very easy to put together, took me about 15 minuets only. The color is nice and easily adjustable to a desired height.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: 2 for the price of 1
customer_reviews.text: It took me maybe ten minutes to put both of them together and the come in small box, it made me nervous a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Tameka Lee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable seating and look fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The stools arrived on time. Excellent condition. Easy to assemble. They are sturdy and match perfectly with my new kitchen. I will probably purchase 4 more for the bar downstairs in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Moderate quality stitching, comfortable, easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Literally 4-5 steps. Smaller than I thought but nice. The only reason I didnt give 5 stars is because the stitching looks like it will start busting soon.
customer_reviews.author: Bugsy Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and  use
customer_reviews.text: Like the adjustable feature. Can bring the seat up or down and rotate it 360°
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Anver

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Only con about it one of the screws didn't fit. But other then that I am very pleased. It came sooner then expected.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Modern, comfortable great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, looks really nice and modern and it very comfortable. I use as my everyday chair for my standing desk at work. I get a lot of compliments on it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Swirlies
customer_reviews.text: The backs could be higher and the seats larger. Otherwise they’re great.
customer_reviews.author: Ross L.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased, easy assembly, arrived a few days ahead of delivery window.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler H

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: After a week or so of use, when you turn sitting on the chair, there’s a metal, scratching sound. It’s awful and is wearing down the metal. It’s a beautiful chair and is otherwise fine, it’s just the pieces don’t fit together causing the metal grinding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Nice
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I've ordered theses chairs. They look just as pictured and are excellent quality. Be careful not to scrape them against the table or each other. They will begin to scratch and peel on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Chris L.

customer_reviews.title: great chair
customer_reviews.text: I was scared to order this because I suck at putting things together, and I didn't know if the white color would be as bright as I hoped. But wow, this chair is very beautiful white color, very sturdy, very very chic. I love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I did not like this bar stool.
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this bar stool. When I sat on the seat, it felt too small & was not comfortable to me. There's not enough room on it to sit back & move to reposition yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT BAD
customer_reviews.text: the bad could be higher. otherwise, perfect for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Good office chair
customer_reviews.text: very happy with my WFH chair. Comfy for long days.
customer_reviews.author: Diana McCue

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and looks great
customer_reviews.text: I love this barstool. It looks and feels great. The only issue I have is that u really have to sit up straight. If u learn forward a little, it will build m tilt forward a little. Outside of that, great chair. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk chair for girls room!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chair, only took a few minutes to assemble! Not super heavy and chair cushion is thick and comfortable. Perfect for my daughters room as a desk chair because it doesn't have rollers which is ideal.
customer_reviews.author: JennaReid

customer_reviews.title: Nice stools
customer_reviews.text: Chairs look great and are easy to assemble. The only thing to be concerned about is that they can tilt forward if you're not careful when or if you lean too much to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Derwin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love these stools!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and comfy. Bring up the nice look to the counter area!
customer_reviews.author: E. Davydenko

customer_reviews.title: Light
customer_reviews.text: My wife’s clients think it’s cozy She likes it’s cuz it’s light and ez to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Ken dog

customer_reviews.title: Love!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair!!! It took about 4 minutes to put together. It’s sturdy and super comfortable I’m very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Shanille

customer_reviews.title: Great bargain for bar stools
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these stools! Got 4 for our island, and very happy with my choice. Looks great, easy to put together, and price was great.
customer_reviews.author: H. nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I’m sad, I really like it those stool.
customer_reviews.text: I love those bar stool, they are pretty and comfy. I really sad it’s been two weeks and one of them are unbound.
customer_reviews.author: Harmon family

customer_reviews.title: Everyone likes this stool. Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: These lasted about a year. One wont lift up aft a yr but still useable
customer_reviews.author: A Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it!!!! Easy to put together. And easy to clean! Very comfy. I bought three more after this one.
customer_reviews.author: ethel royal

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to use at my counter-high desk that I use for my painting hobby. It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Norman K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and priced right. I use it for my vanity and it is great. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JaniceB

customer_reviews.title: Worst service and product
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old could not sit on that.It is too small in size and I had a very bad experience returning it.They charged me 40$for returning it.
customer_reviews.author: gayathri

customer_reviews.title: East to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I love how it looks and very easy to assemble! Only thing is i can’t see my head in my mirror maybe my desk is to short I don’t know & if you’re wider your going to be hanging off lol it’s not SUPER comfortable but it’ll do
customer_reviews.author: Alma G.

customer_reviews.title: Bar stools
customer_reviews.text: That's was the right thing for my kitchen bar. Good quality and looks executive.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS CHAIR!
customer_reviews.text: Literally took 5 minutes to put together & I must say, I LOVE this chair! Came well packaged, came with all the parts and instructions. You will be very pleased with this purchase as I am ecstatic!
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: Footrest broke after 2 1/2 months!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bar stool inself. It was easy to assemble and looks good. Fairly comfortable to sit on for a long time. But today, one of the two welds attaching the footrest broke -- just 2 1/2 months after I bought it. Very disappointing! So I cannot recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Better on hardwood than carpet.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together but not as comfortable as I thought. The base is a bit small and is not meant to be put in Medium to thick carpet. I noticed they wobble. Hard flooring should be better.
customer_reviews.author: Mac Alshaarawi

customer_reviews.title: Wasn't what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: The stool came with something that looked like a blu pen mark on it which was kind of annoying luckily i will be getting a seat cover. When sitting in the chair it wobbles a little and is not too sturdy. Overall I rate this chair a 6/10. Wouldn't reccomend there's better chairs than this out there
customer_reviews.author: Christal Y Grant

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Swivel Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great Chair for my makeup corner! It was so easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The are not heavy, commercial strength chairs, but for an inexpensive pair of home bar stool, they're great. Easy to assemble, sturdy, and look sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Garret Moose

customer_reviews.title: We loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the fabric, adjustable weight works perfectly. And the design is also an high light of this fabric. We loved it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These chairs looked great for about a day for the seams are ripping ...
customer_reviews.text: These chairs looked great for about a day for the seams are ripping after very light use. I just wish they were stronger or that they sold replacement chairs so I didn’t have to look at the broken seams
customer_reviews.author: Phillip

customer_reviews.title: Not a good bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. Came with holes in them. Bottom is not very sturdy so if you lean back the chair will tip.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Looks really decent and modern
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Looks really decent and modern. It fit perfectly with my bar table and in my studio apart.
customer_reviews.author: Jing Man

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chair but need seat replacement please.
customer_reviews.text: This was the only way I could attach a photo... Chair is beautiful except for this staple protruding the back top area. Message sent to seller for replacement please.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Amazing chair. Comfy, stylish and nice quality. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Beightol

customer_reviews.title: Super easy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Easiest thing I have ever built! So simple I was scared to sit on it at first, but works well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beyond my expectation!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting such a comfortable bar stool. The cushion is very soft and stool is sturdy albeit light. Assembly was a breeze. I would have bought a pair if I had known the quality is this good. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Annette Blum

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate how easy the set up was for this chair. it is so comfortable and a great addition to my beauty room! Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, comfortable at an unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, sturdy chairs that look very nice in my kitchen. I love that they are easily adjustable to one’s liking. 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Dags Mija

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools! Like the cushions & that it rotates around and adjusts in height. Adds flare to the kitchen! Bottom seems a bit lightweight. Happy with my purchase !
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Very tippy
customer_reviews.text: Too light weight. Hard to get on the stool without tipping it. Needs some weight on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: dvw

customer_reviews.title: Cuuutttteeee!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy....I am 5’11 and 170 lbs it holds my weight very well doesn’t seem like it will fall over
customer_reviews.author: Lalaz

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. For my functional workspace and it fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TP1

customer_reviews.title: We are very pleased and will probably purchase another set.
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with our purchase. They arrived quickly and were easy to assemble. They look just like the picture. They are also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Cordella Malloy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stools for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price, sturdiness is not the best but hey what would you expect, but overall they are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine today! And I love it. I just give it four stars because when you lean forward it tends to lift and fall forward but other then that it was super easy to assemble ! Pretty comfy and very nice 😍
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can't tell you how much I love these chairs, plus they ate super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Omg I can't tell you how much I love these chairs, plus they ate super easy to put together!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to adjust the height
customer_reviews.text: It's impossible to adjust the height. Considering its price, I am happy to use it as the fixed-height stool.
customer_reviews.author: Xiaoguang

customer_reviews.title: Great chair and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my job and love it! Took me less than 10mins to assemble without any help from no one. Instructions were super easy to follow

product_meta.title: COSTWAY Bar Stool, Modern Swivel Adjustable Armless Barstools, Square Counter Height PU Leather Bar Stools for Kitchen Dining Living Bistro Pub Chair Counter Back Barstool(White, Set of 2)
product_meta.description:
Color:White| Size:Set of 2Description
Our brand new and upgraded bar stools combine the modern and classic style, which will offer you a comfortable seating experience. The distinctive bar stool simple but elegant design makes it perfect for home, restaurant, pub use etc. Our bar stool is different from other barstools. It is in high quality and comes at a very good price. The bar stool is Waterproof and anti-aging PU leather combining with heavy duty metal frame provides you years of durable use. It has an ergonomic cushioned seat, and a swivel design, which makes it stylish yet comfortable at the same time. Don't hesitate to buy it now!

Feature
Brand new and high quality
Comfortable back rest with stylish modern design
Swivel 360 degrees
The base and foot rest are both constructed of chromed steel ,durable and stable
Wear-resisting, breathable, ageing resisting and no peculiar smell
Adopts ergonomic principles
Quadrate cushion, filled with high density stereotypes sponges
Pneumatic adjustable height with handle, easy and safe for adjustment
Plating processing can isolate air antirust with strong mirror effect to highlight the texture
14" Rubber ring bottom to prevent floor from scratching
Easy for assembling
Sold in pairs
Accessory Pack Included

Specification
Color: White
Material: PU leather, Steel, Sponge
Overall dimension: 16" x 14" x (34.5"-42.5") (L x W x H) 
Seat size:16"W x 14"D
Back size:15.6"W x 10.4"H
Height from seat to the floor: 24.5"-32.5"
Weight capacity: 330 Lbs
Package includes: 
2 x Bar Stool
1 x Instruction
feature_bullets: ✨【 Modern and Classic】These upgraded bar stools combine the modern and classic style, which are perfect for your restaurant, bistro, coffee house, patio, home kitchen or any other decor theme. You can place these bar stools to wherever you want.

✨【Functional Design】The organically designed PU leather of bar stool seat swivels 360 degrees and the bar stool semi-circular footrest is durable and stable, which provide you a comfortable seat experience.

✨【Comfortable Bar Stool】The built-in footrest of our bar stool is durable and stable, which is different from other bar stools. Our latest bar stool provides a comfortable place to rest your feet. And the design comfortable back rest adopts ergonomic principles, which makes you feel more relaxed.

✨【Sturdy and Durable Barstool】Constructed with metal material, our bar stools can bear 250lbs weight so that they are more sturdy and durable for longer years to use. Bar stool Dimension: 17.5"X16"X34.5"-42.5"(LXWXH)

✨【Non-Marking】The bar stool stands on a sturdy circular chrome steel base, which has a 14” rubber ring to prevent your floor from scratching. This distinctive bar stool will definitely give you a Particularly good experience.
